synopsis.text: Monstrous entities threaten Japan's tranquility, leading the Shinkansen Ultra Evolution Institute to create powerful robots known as "Shinkalions." The Institute's latest innovations, the "Shinkalion Z" and transformative "Zailiners," are designed to fortify the front lines against these enigmatic foes. When a fresh onslaught of attacks strikes, two young boys cross paths, sparking an unprecedented evolution in the Shinkalion. As new enemies surface, these boys join forces with the Institute's members to pilot the Shinkalion Z, battling the colossal monsters that have resurfaced. Based on Takara Tomy's toy line, this captivating series invites viewers to embark on an action-packed adventure, witnessing the thrilling exploits of these young heroes and their extraordinary machines.
